name: GKScene
desc: A container for associating GameplayKit objects with a SpriteKit scene.

items.name: init?(fileNamed: String)
items.desc: Loads the specified SpriteKit scene file, creating a GKScene object containing the SpriteKit scene and associated GameplayKit objects.

items.name: var rootNode: GKSceneRootNodeType?
items.desc: The SpriteKit scene managed by this GKScene object.

items.name: var entities: [GKEntity]
items.desc: The list of GameplayKit entities managed by the scene.

items.name: func addEntity(GKEntity)
items.desc: Adds a GameplayKit entity to the list of entities managed by the scene.

items.name: func removeEntity(GKEntity)
items.desc: Removes a GameplayKit entity from the list of entities managed by the scene.

items.name: var graphs: [String : GKGraph]
items.desc: The list of pathfinding graph objects managed by the scene.

items.name: func removeGraph(String)
items.desc: Removes a pathfinding graph from the list of graphs managed by the scene.
